rules.natural: If the security assessment of device_001 is compliant, then the system_operational status of platform_alpha is true.
The audit report for platform_alpha is clean or it is qualified.
Whenever the audit report for platform_alpha is qualified, then if the system_operational status of platform_alpha is not true, emergency shutdown for platform_alpha is initiated.

Under the condition that penetration testing for platform_alpha is passed, then if the audit report for platform_alpha is clean, it follows that when the system_operational status of platform_alpha is not true, emergency shutdown for platform_alpha is initiated.

If penetration testing for platform_alpha is failed, then given that the audit report for platform_alpha is clean, then whenever the system_operational status of platform_alpha is not true, emergency shutdown for platform_alpha is initiated.
Should the vulnerability scan for platform_alpha be completed, then penetration testing for platform_alpha is passed.
The vulnerability scan for platform_alpha is completed or it is pending.
Provided that the compliance certificate for platform_alpha is valid, then if system backup for platform_alpha is failed, system backup for platform_alpha is successful.
The compliance certificate for platform_alpha is valid or it is expired.
If the security assessment of device_002 is compliant, then the system_operational status of platform_alpha is true.
Whenever the compliance certificate for platform_alpha is expired, then under the condition that system backup for platform_alpha is failed, system backup for platform_alpha is successful.
If the license agreement for platform_alpha is rejected, then it is not the case that the license agreement for platform_alpha is accepted.
Should customer notification for platform_alpha be delayed, then customer notification for platform_alpha is sent.
A financial audit for platform_alpha is initiated or it is waived.
Provided that a financial audit for platform_alpha is waived, then legal action against platform_alpha does not hold as pending.
If regulatory approval for platform_alpha is granted, then the license agreement for platform_alpha is accepted.
Should regulatory approval for platform_alpha be granted, then the license agreement for platform_alpha is rejected.
Under the condition that regulatory approval for platform_alpha is granted, then market listing for platform_alpha is approved.
Regulatory approval for platform_alpha is granted or the security assessment of device_001 is compliant or the security assessment of device_002 is compliant.
If a security breach on platform_alpha is detected, then a security breach on platform_alpha is contained.
If the investment product crypto_fund is suspended, then a security breach on platform_alpha is not contained.
Provided that the investment product crypto_fund is restricted, then the investment product crypto_fund is suspended.
The investment product crypto_fund is terminated or if the investment product crypto_fund is available, then the investment product crypto_fund is restricted.
If market listing for platform_alpha is rejected, then market listing for platform_alpha is not approved.
Under the condition that the operational status of platform_alpha is active, then the system_operational status of platform_alpha is true.
If user authentication for platform_alpha is biometric, then user authentication for platform_alpha is multi-factor.
Provided that user authentication for platform_alpha is multi-factor, then transaction processing for platform_alpha is enabled.

Under the condition that it is not the case that if the vulnerability scan for platform_alpha is pending, then penetration testing for platform_alpha is failed, then system backup for platform_alpha is failed.

If it is not the case that a regulatory inspection of platform_alpha is scheduled or if a financial audit for platform_alpha is initiated, then legal action against platform_alpha is not pending, then a regulatory inspection of platform_alpha is completed.

Under the condition that it is not the case that a regulatory inspection of platform_alpha is scheduled or if a financial audit for platform_alpha is initiated, then legal action against platform_alpha is not pending, then it is not the case that a regulatory inspection of platform_alpha is completed.
Should it not be true that if user authentication for platform_alpha is biometric, then transaction processing for platform_alpha is enabled, then a security breach on platform_alpha is detected.
